attributes.action: Leave the EU with no deal forthwith
attributes.additional_details: There have been petitions by remoaners with some 6m votes but still not even HALF the number who voted to leave. We were given 2 simple choices - LEAVE or REMAIN. We voted leave and as the government and the controlling EU have failed to reach a suitable/agreeable deal then we should LEAVE. No more extensions, no more excuses, No more EU membership.
attributes.background: On 23rd June 2016 residents of the United Kingdom voted on wether to Leave the EU or remain. The largest polling turnout in a generation with the final result of 51.89% (17,410,742 people) voting to leave. Since then our Government, the very people supposed to represent us have failed to honour this
